article_node.title: ChatGPT app makes $2 billion, earns $2.91 per install: report
article_node.summary: OpenAI’s ChatGPT mobile app earns $2.91 per install and has generated $1.35 billion in revenue this year, far surpassing rivals such as Grok and Claude. With roughly 690 million global downloads and an average of 45 million monthly downloads, the app has seen a 180 % jump in usage compared to the previous year. The data fuel a dispute between Elon Musk’s xAI and OpenAI over alleged Apple App Store ranking favoritism. Meanwhile, OpenAI announced GPT‑5, promising “PhD‑level expert” capabilities across all fields.
